Class ClientLogic

  • java.lang.Object

    IClientLogic, IClientLogicHandlerFacade, IRemoteCommunicationListener, ILogic, ILogicHandlerFacade<IClientDependencyContainer>

    public class ClientLogic
extends AbstractLogic<IClientDependencyContainer,IClientLogicListener>
implements IClientLogicHandlerFacade, IClientLogic
    Logic for the Client: The "missing" part between the user interface and the host.

    sven
